Sept. 15, 1906 D Cwmgorse Contest (Section 1)
Cwmgorse Contest (Section 1) 10 Test Piece Contest Cwmgorse Contest cwmgorse-contest-section-1
Daughter of the Regiment [arr. Greenwood]
Cwmgorse, Neath Port Talbot, Wales, UK 1st prize £12, 2nd prize £5, 3rd prize £3. 4 bands competed
March 13, 2012, 3:29 p.m. Sept. 15, 2018, 8:48 p.m.
1 Ystalyfera Public Charles Anthony Morgan
2 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen James Woodhead
3 Morgan's Cwmtawe Ystalyfera Evan John Evans
4 Tycroes Silver David D. Williams
